**********************************************

B07D5484 00000000
5000085C C2800000
D3000000 00000000
601007B0 00000000
B01007B0 00000000
B0006E0C 00000000
0010B82C EA000003
D2000000 00000000
{
In effect when playing a level.\n
In order to restore powerup defaults,\n
disable this cheat code when not in a level.
}

[Moon Jump]
D3000000 17000000
607D5484 00000000
B07D5484 00000000
5000085C C2800000
D3000000 00000000
603E1300 00000000
B03E1300 00000000
B0000274 00000000
B0000074 00000000
60000748 00000000
D9000000 00000120
D4000000 00110000
D6000000 00000120
D2000000 00000000
{
Makes Mario/Luigi jump higher.\n
(For use with CTRPF, replace 00110000 with 00055000.)
}

[(B) Infinite Jump]
DD000000 00000002
D3000000 17000000
607D5484 00000000
B07D5484 00000000
5000085C C2800000
D3000000 00000000
603E1300 00000000
B03E1300 00000000
B0000274 00000000
B0000074 00000000
60000748 00000000
00000120 42100000
D2000000 00000000
{
Allows Mario/Luigi to infinitely jump multiple times in mid-air.\n
Hold button to jump as high as desired.
}

[++Unlock Codes++]

[(L+R+Up+X) Unlock All (5 Shiny Stars)]
DD000000 00000740
D3000000 17000000
607D5484 00000000
B07D5484 00000000
6000085C C3200000

D3000000 00000000
603E1300 00000000
B03E1300 00000000
B0000270 00000000
DC000000 0003AAB4
50000000 00000000
DC000000 00000000

DC000000 00000060
D0000000 00000000
50000000 00000002
DC000000 000000C0
D0000000 00000000
00002C40 0FFF0000
00002C68 00000163
D3000000 00000000
603E1300 00000000
B03E1300 00000000
B0000270 00000000
600465AC C3200000
600465AC C1800000
DC000000 0003AAB4
50000000 00000000
DC000000 00000000
D0000000 00000000
50000000 00000001
DC000000 0000008C
D0000000 00000000
50000000 00000002
DC000000 00000118
D0000000 00000000
00002D58 3FFFFFFF
D3000000 00000000
603E1300 00000000
B03E1300 00000000
B0000270 00000000
600465AC C3200000
600465AC C1800000
DC000000 0003AAB4
50000000 00000000
DC000000 00000000
D0000000 00000000
50000000 00000001
DC000000 00002990
D0000000 00000000
50000000 00000002
DC000000 00005320
D0000000 00000000
DC000000 00002F20
C0000000 00000087
20000000 00000002
2000000C 00000064
DC000000 00000020
D1000000 00000000
D3000000 00000000
603E1300 00000000
B03E1300 00000000
B0000270 00000000
600465AC C3200000
600465AC C1800000
DC000000 0003AAB4
50000000 00000000
DC000000 00000000
D0000000 00000000
50000000 00000001
DC000000 00002990
D0000000 00000000
50000000 00000002
DC000000 00005320
D0000000 00000000
DC000000 00004028
C0000000 00000086
20000000 0000003F
DC000000 0000001C
D1000000 00000000
20000000 00000037
D2000000 00000000
{
For currently opened save file:\n
* All Normal & Special Worlds unlocked.\n
* All Normal & Special Levels unlocked.\n
* All Pictures collected.\n
* All Star Coins collected.\n
* Star Coin counter set to a reasonable number.\n
* All requirements met for a 5 Shiny Stars save.\n
This code does not:\n
* Reopen already closed Mystery Boxes or Toad Houses.\n
* Overwrite best level times (if any).\n
* Change character attributes, like number of lives,\n
  current powerup, current level, etcetera.
}
